title: 服务端崩溃
author: 覃保晶
txt_content: 启动完成之后开始报错，然后就....崩了> [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: java.io.EOFException > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at java.io.ObjectInputStream$PeekInputStream.readFully(ObjectInputStream.java:2681) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at java.io.ObjectInputStream$BlockDataInputStream.readShort(ObjectInputStream.java:3156) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at java.io.ObjectInputStream.readStreamHeader(ObjectInputStream.java:862) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at java.io.ObjectInputStream.(ObjectInputStream.java:358) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.LeaderboardDataHandler.loadLeaderboard(LeaderboardDataHandler.java:63) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.LeaderboardDataHandler.init(LeaderboardDataHandler.java:32) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.AoALeaderboard$InitTask.run(AoALeaderboard.java:96) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/WARN]: at net.tslat.aoa3.library.leaderboard.AoALeaderboard.run(AoALeaderboard.java:43) > [11:21:54] [Thread-17/ERROR]: Unable to load leaderboard from file: I can't access the file!

replies.author: _DIM_
replies.txt_content: 虚无删掉试试？你这发的并不全。
